## PerspectiveCamera.setPerspective() method

Setup a perspective projection matrix for the camera

**Signature:**

```typescript
setPerspective(fovY: number, aspect: number, zNear: number, zFar: number): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fovY | number | The vertical field of view in radians. |
|  aspect | number | The aspect ratio |
|  zNear | number | The near clip plane |
|  zFar | number | The far clip plane |

this

self
